entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 90
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
HIGHEST HEAT INDEX READINGS HEAT INDEX READINGS UP TO 105

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HOT WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
HIGHEST HEAT INDEX READINGS HEAT INDEX READINGS UP TO 112 IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY, HOT WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 90S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING NORTH AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHEST HEAT INDEX READINGS HEAT INDEX READINGS UP TO 110 IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 70S

SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HOT WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
HIGHEST HEAT INDEX READINGS HEAT INDEX READINGS UP TO 105 IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
